title: Chard RFC
text:
Chard Rugby Football Club is an <a href="England">English</a> <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> team based in <a href="Chard%2C%20Somerset">Chard</a> in <a href="Somerset">Somerset</a>. The club run three senior men's teams, a Ladies' XV and the full range of junior teams. The first XV play in <a href="Tribute%20Western%20Counties%20West">Tribute Western Counties West</a> after being relegated from <a href="Tribute%20South%20West%201%20West">Tribute South West 1 West</a> in 2016–17. The second XV play in Tribute Somerset 2 South The third XV in Tribute Somerset 3 South and the Ladies currently play Women's NC South West South 2(1).
